description:
My place is close to the heart of Bushwick, Brooklyn! Very convenient to th(URL HIDDEN)trains and plenty of food and bars! 

You’ll love my place because of the people, the ambiance, the neighborhood, and the light. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: MODERN BEDROOM IN BROOKLYN! BUSHWICK! FUN AREA!
review: our hosts were really laid back and friendly! they took us on pretty short notice, and gave us a bunch of recommendations of what to see in the neighborhood, and had a cozy room for us to stay in with good heating & ac. we walked in at random points throughout the day and it was nbd. super friendly and relaxed! Thanks for hosting!
